sli.name: availability_{{ service_name }}_api
sli.description: Success ratio of requests for api in {{ service_name }}.

sli.name: availability_{{ service_name }}_db
sli.description: Success ratio of requests for db in {{ service_name }}.

sli.name: latency_{{ service_name }}_api
sli.description: Average response time of requests for api in {{ service_name }}.

sli.name: error_rate_{{ service_name }}_api
sli.description: Number of errors in requests for api in {{ service_name }} as a ratio.

explanation: Each SLI corresponds to a component defined in the availability objectives and includes additional SLIs for latency and error rate. PromQL queries are used for measurement.
llm_suggestions: Consider adding more SLIs based on the specific needs of your service.
Use dynamic thresholds based on historical SLI performance trends.
